text:
We’ve now lost more New Jerseyans to #COVID19 than we lost in World War I, the Korean War, the Vietnam War, both Gulf Wars, the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq, Superstorm Sandy, and 9-11 COMBINED.

Take this seriously. Stay home. Save lives.
